title: Nyx, The Vanquisher [Re-Created]
body:
*Original Champion Concept by Sylpharion, no use without permission.

**Nyx, The Vanquisher.**

**Health:** 579 – 2049
**Health Regen:** 8.4 – 19.5
**Pride:** 100
**Range:** 125 (Melee) – 500 (Ranged)
**Attack Damage:** 58 - 113
**Attack Speed:** .694 (+0% – 52.7%)
**Armour:** 27 – 86
**Magic Resist:** 32 – 54
**Movement Speed:** 340
*Pride is similar to Fury, but instead she starts with 100 and loses it from abilities, gaining 5 every 5 seconds or 10 from minions / monsters, and 100 from champions.

**Passive:** Open Wound / Torment
When Nyx attacks or uses an ability enemy unit, they are applied 1 stack of Open Wound, at 4 stacks Torment is applied.

Torment causes enemies to have Heavy Wounds reducing all healing and regeneration by 55 / 60 / 65% for 1 / 1.5 / 2 seconds or until she stops dealing damage to them and causing the enemy to take 5 / 6 / 7% of their missing health.
Enemies can only be affected Torment once every 11 seconds but stacks of Open Wound still apply with a maximum of 1 stack during this time.

The ability automatically levels up at levels; six and eleven.

**Q:** Dancing Doppelganger
Nyx creates a shadow behind the enemy target, doing a full turn slash with her scythe the shadow stays there for four seconds and during this time she can consume 40 Pride in order to do one more slash and swapping places with her shadow. If she is close enough to her target, she is able to hit the / those target(s) with a total of 4 times but take 50% less damage from the last.

>Cast Range: 800
Slash Radius: 400
Slow: 35% for 2 seconds
Damage: 70 / 90 / 110 / 130 / 150 (+50% of AD & 40% of AP)
Max Damage: 140 / 180 / 220 / 260 / 300 (+100% of AD & 75% of AP)
Cooldown: 10 / 9.5 / 9 / 8.5 / 8

**W:** Virtual Nightmare
Nyx calls forth a line of shadows stunning all enemies hit, during the next 3 seconds if she re-activates the ability to consume 35 Pride, a giant cone of bats burst forth from the area that the shadows previously were and fears enemies.

>Range: 700
Diameter: 400
Stun: 1.3 seconds
Damage: 50 / 90 / 130 / 170 / 210 (+55% of AP)
Fear: .7 second
Secondary Damage: 0 / 10 / 20 / 30 / 40 (+35% of AP)
Cooldown: 12 / 11.25 / 10.50 / 9.75 / 9

**E:** Assault
Nyx dashes forward (able to go through walls) towards her cursor and goes invisible for a short duration. For the next few seconds, if she attacks an enemy unit, she causes them to take bonus damage and have reduced resistances for a few seconds. If she kills an enemy champion the cooldown is reset, killing enemy minions or neutral monsters will reduce the cooldown. She can consume 35 to instantly reduce the cooldown, have a longer invisibility duration and increased movement speed while stealth.

>Dash Range: 350
Bonus Damage: 20 / 40 / 60 / 80 / 120 (+25% of AP)
Resistance Reduction: Armor / MR by 20% for 2 seconds
Stealth Duration: 1 second (+1)
Movement Speed: 35%
Cooldown: 6 (-50% of Current Cooldown)


**R:** Extend / Assassinate
Nyx gains bonus attack range.
>Bonus Range: 75 / 150 / 225 (+ 125 Melee Range)

Nyx dashes (teleports) behind the enemy champion and slashes them dealing a base damage plus a percentage of the target's missing health.
If the enemy champion dies this ability cooldown is refreshed and she gains pride.

>Cast Range: 1100
Damage: 150 / 225 / 300 (+50% of AP) + 9 / 11 / 13% of Missing Health
Cooldown: 95 / 80 / 65
Requirement: Must have 10 or less Pride.
(This is quite hard if you look at how much Pride her abilities cost.)

She starts with 100 Pride, as her interactive ability bar, having a similar function as Fury, Mana, or Energy except it doesn't work the same way. She uses them up per ability cast but she gains some per minion kill or over time. Killing a champion gains Nyx a full bar. The trick is to lower your pride low enough to actually use her ultimate ability.
